eu.amidst.dynamic.utils

Class DynamicBayesianNetworkSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.utils.DynamicBayesianNetworkSampler

  • public class DynamicBayesianNetworkSampler
extends Object
    This class implements the interface AmidstOptionsHandler. It defines a sampler of data from a DynamicBayesianNetwork.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicBayesianNetworkSampler(DynamicBayesianNetwork network1)
      Creates a new DynamicBayesianNetworkSampler given an input DynamicBayesianNetwork object.
